body: Has anyone made a converter to create the psychrometric chart with english units?  BTU/lb, & deg.F?

replies.body: Hi Mike. Chris has it on the list > ([https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/issues/168](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/issues/168)) I'm pretty sure he will get back to you soon.

Hey Mike, I just finished implementing this and you can find a psych chart with IP functionality in the attached GH file.  To trigger the IP capability, all that you have to do is connect temperature values that are in degrees Fahrenheit (and include an "F" in the stream of connected temperature data). [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/*4sM22xZ7yt7RcmFv3V0ir*kZW-QyvpVK3xvlCRc10Lv1OeEd9HzVDDqBCSXqZMq82ZN5-8ujVRbshe4qz2zRcMXk5Mr7Jn0/IPPsychChart.JPG) -Chris

OK, that's just awesome . . . thanks!

Cheers!
